data.title: Leandro Barbosa Player Profile, Phoenix Suns
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Leandro Barbosa on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 26, 2003 - The San Antonio Spurs selected Leandro Barbosa in Round 1 with Pick 28 in the 2003 NBA Draft. Jun 26, 2003 - The draft rights to Leandro Barbosa was acquired by the Phoenix Suns from the San Antonio Spurs in exchange for a conditional 2004 1st round pick (PHX own). Jul 16, 2003 - Leandro Barbosa signed a multi-year contract with the Phoenix Suns. Oct 27, 2005 - The Phoenix Suns exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Leandro Barbosa. Aug 4, 2006 - Leandro Barbosa signed a rookie scale extension with the Phoenix Suns. Jul 14, 2010 - Leandro Barbosa was acquired by the Toronto Raptors, along with Dwayne Jones and a TPE, from the Phoenix Suns in exchange for Hedo Turkoglu. Jun 25, 2011 - Leandro Barbosa exercised a Player Option to extend his contract. Mar 15, 2012 - Leandro Barbosa was acquired by the Indiana Pacers from the Toronto Raptors in exchange for a 2012 2nd round pick (IND own) and cash. Jul 1, 2012 - Leandro Barbosa, previously with the Indiana Pacers, became a free agent. Jul 12, 2012 - The Indiana Pacers renounced their free-agent exception rights to Leandro Barbosa. Oct 18, 2012 - Leandro Barbosa signed a contract with the Boston Celtics. Feb 21, 2013 - Leandro Barbosa was acquired by the Washington Wizards, along with Jason Collins, cash and a TPE, from the Boston Celtics in exchange for Jordan Crawford. Jul 1, 2013 - Leandro Barbosa, previously with the Washington Wizards, became a free agent. Jan 8, 2014 - Leandro Barbosa signed a contract with the Phoenix Suns. Jan 18, 2014 - Leandro Barbosa, previously with the Phoenix Suns, became a free agent. Jan 18, 2014 - Leandro Barbosa signed a contract with the Phoenix Suns. Jan 28, 2014 - Leandro Barbosa, previously with the Phoenix Suns, became a free agent. Jan 28, 2014 - Leandro Barbosa signed a contract with the Phoenix Suns. Jul 1, 2014 - Leandro Barbosa, previously with the Phoenix Suns, became a free agent. Sep 10, 2014 - Leandro Barbosa signed a contract with the Golden State Warriors. Jul 1, 2015 - Leandro Barbosa, previously with the Golden State Warriors, became a free agent. Jul 13, 2015 - Leandro Barbosa signed a contract with the Golden State Warriors. Jul 1, 2016 - Leandro Barbosa, previously with the Golden State Warriors, became a free agent. Jul 7, 2016 - The Golden State Warriors renounced their free-agent exception rights to Leandro Barbosa. Jul 19, 2016 - Leandro Barbosa signed a multi-year contract with the Phoenix Suns. Jul 3, 2017 - The Phoenix Suns placed the contract of Leandro Barbosa on waivers. Jul 5, 2017 - Leandro Barbosa, previously with the Phoenix Suns, became a free agent.
